Kabul , Afghanistan : Some called him the Messenger of Death .
During Afghanistan 's brutal civil war of the 1990 s , Abdullah Abdullah became famous as the government official who periodically announced how many rebels had been slain .
The government was dominated by Tajiks , a smaller ethnic group .
